Funeral services are scheduled for 2 pm, June 1, 2004, for J. R. Thompson in Overton, TX at Cottle-Pearson Funeral Home. He was the father of James Thompson (Class of 1963), Judy Thompson Oller (Class of 1960), and Deanna Thompson Posey (Class of 1956).

EARNEST SHIFLETT

There was a Memorial Service for Earnest Shiflett, Class of 1950, in Overton, TX on Wednesday, May 12, 2004 at 2:00 PM.

Isabel (Phillips) Gallegos of Kingman, AZ passed away on April 6, 2004. She was a member of the Class of 1939.

Mattie Woodruff, long time elementary teacher at London Schools, passed away. She is survived by a daughter, Wanda Ingram, Class of 1951, of Texarkana, TX and a son, Bob Woodruff, Class of 1954, of Tyler, TX.

BOBBY LOVEALL

Bobby Loveall, Class of 1957, passed away on March 7, 2004.

LOYD RICHARDSON

DOROTHY (ROBERTS) TAYLOR

Dorothy (Roberts) Taylor, Class of 1950, passed away March 3, 2004 in Garland, TX. She is survived by brothers, Joe Frank and Roy; and sister, Martha Sue Van Wormer and Kathleen Garlick.

MILDRED EVANS

Mildred Evans, former London First Grade Teacher, passed away on January 29, 2004 in Henderson, Texas. She had retired from teaching in 1967. Her husband, C. F. Evans, also taught at London. She is survived by her son Duane, Class of 1953.

DOLLY OPAL WOOD CATES

Services for Dorothy Opal Wood Cates were held Monday, December 29, 2003. She was the mother of Bobby Wood (Class of 1959), Larry Wood (Class of 1964), Dorothy Terry, Linda Daugherty, and Cathy Faulkner.

HOLLIS BATES

Hollis Bates, brother of several London High School graduates, passed away on December 17, 2003.

PATRICIA UTSEY

Patricia Ann Utsey, wife of Bill Utsey, Class of 1950, passed away Friday, December 3, 2003 after a long illness. Memorials may be made to the London Baptist Church Family Life Center.

BILL RENFRO

Bill Renfro, Class of 1961, passed away on December 3, 2003 in Houston Texas. His funeral was December 6, 2003.

JOHN REAGAN

John Reagan, Class of 1935 and coach at London High School during the early 1950's, passed away on November 29, 2003. His father, E. W. Reagan was on the school board at the time of the explosion.

BILL SPRAGUE

Bill Sprague, father of Kenneth Sprague, Class of 1959, passed away on November 28, 2003.

GERALD THOMPSON

Gerald Thompson, Class of 1944, passed away in November in Dickinson, Texas.

WILLIAM E. (BILL) ANDREWS

Bill Andrews, Class of "62, lost his life in an automobile accident July 24, 2003. He was living in Yukon, OK.

S. M. RILEY, JR.

S. M. Riley, Jr. passed away on September 13, 2003 in Tyler , TX. He had lived in New London since 1939 and was a 1942 graduate of London High School. He had been an integral part of New London, having owned Riley's Foods from 1926 until 2002.
